resources.string: Any types of animal meat; fish; seafood; mushrooms.
Pea, soy beans, runner bean, chickpea, lens, and other types of beans.
Olive, sunflower, almound oils, and any other botanical oils.
Tomatoes(!), oranges, lemons, grapefruits, mandarins and other citruses; pineapples; pomegranate, currant; sour apples, pears, plums, apricots, grape.
Mango, watemellon, blueberry, peaches, strawberry, raspberry, sweet apples, sweet apricots and grapes
Bananas, sweet pears, dried fruits, fig, date plum.
Cucumbers, broccoli, cabbage, bell pepper, eggplant, onions, greenery
Cottage cheese, kefir, yogurt, tan, ect
Any types of cheese (except for cottage cheese)

Fish - cod, scrod, flounder, sole seafood - 30 min. digestion time Fish - salmon, salmon trout, herring, (more fatty fish) - 45 min. to 60 digestion time Chicken - 11/2 to 2 hours digestion time (without skin) Turkey - 2 to 2 1/4 hours digestion time (without skin) Beef, lamb - 3 to 4 hours digestion time Pork - 4 1/2 to 5 hours.
Cottage or low fat pot cheese or ricotta - approx. 90 min. digestion time whole milk cottage cheese - 120 min. digestion.
Almonds, filberts, peanuts (raw), cashews, Brazil, walnuts, pecans etc. - 2 1/2 to 3 hours to digest.
Lentils, limes, chick peas, peas, pigeon peas, kidney beans, etc. - 90 min. digestion time soy beans -120 min. digestion time
Brown rice, millet, buckwheat, cornmeal, oats (first 3 vegetables best) - 90 min. Corn, potatoes, sweet potatoes - 60 min.

Lettuces, cucumber, celery, red or green pepper, other succulent vegetables - 30 to 40 min. digestion. - Steamed or cooked vegetables Leafy vegetables - escarole, spinach, kale, collards etc. - 40 min. - Zucchini, broccoli, cauliflower - 45 min.
Root vegetables - carrots, beets, parsnips, turnips etc. - 50 min.
Watermelon - 20 min.digestion time. Other melons - Cantaloupe, Cranshaw, Honeydew, etc. - 30 min.
Oranges, grapefruit, grapes - 30 min. Apples, pears, peaches, cherries etc. - digest in 40 min.
Egg yolk - 30 min. digestion time. Whole egg - 45 min.
whole milk hard cheese - 4 to 5 hours digestion time.
